ai-mil6.2.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:

ai-mil6.2.1:7.5_0: But it’s because Venerable Sāriputta isn’t able to satisfy the senior mendicants with nothing to do with the perspectives and considerations. That’s why he cannot ask for them questions or the detailed exposition of the teaching on the forehead.
